text-snippet.content: You agree to hold harmless and indemnify Presearch, and its subsidiaries, affiliates, directors, advisors, officers, agents, employees, advertisers, licensors, suppliers, or partners, (collectively "Presearch and Partners") from and against any third party claim arising from or in any way related to your use of Presearch services, violation of the Terms or any other actions connected with use of Presearch services, including any liability or expense arising from all claims, losses, damages (actual and consequential), suits, judgments, litigation costs and attorney fees, of every kind and nature.
